title: WBSETCL Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Director Posts
description: The West Bengal State Electricity Transmission Company (WBSETCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Director Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Electrical Engineering can apply for the WBSETCL Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age ...
